title: looking to do some trading, got some cool cards to offer!
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: looking to do some trading, got some cool cards to offer!
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards available for trade:
T206:
Chance old mill
Tinker - old mill
Evers: piedmont 350

m116:
Jennings( back damage)
Walsh tape stain
Needham
Reulbach - PSA1 (back damage)
Reulbach SGC 50
sERIES 4 Envelope!

T213-2 Chase holding trophy (Buffalo)

Bf2 Ferguson Bakery - Tinker

M101-4 :
Hendrix

signed cards:
E120 hoyt (super nice!)
Diamond stars - Glen Myatt
T206 John Mcgraw - JSA came back on this one as unable to authenticate, sure looks real though but most likely isnt!
T206 lewis richie - no idea on this one. pencil signature on back but it doesnt match the one lewis richie I have seen)


I am looking for any of the following:
m116 Mordecai Brown, Joe Tinker, and cubs black backs
M101-4 - Mordecai Brown, Ed Walsh, Doolan, Flack, Fischer, Lavender, Mann, Williams, Yerkes
Tris Speaker - anything especially E120
1933 Goudey - autographed
T202 - Cobb, Speaker, Matthewson, etc
